experience: You and Whitney both know Hector Botero, Howard Glicken, and 6 others

The Creative Insight Journey Course is based on a course originally taught at Stanford University's MBA by Dr. Michael Ray that helps individuals access their true authentic self, creativity and innovation. Over the years, he has become known as the "Innovation Guru" of Silicon Valley.  The Creative Insight Journey is a unique transformational self-discovery and empowerment  course that works on a molecular level. Over an eight-week period and working with over 60 different exercises and practices, truly ANYTHING is possible! After dealing with a health challenge that impacted me professionally and personally, I took this course and loved it. I loved it so much that I got certified to teach the state-of-the-art methodology. Contact me if you are interested in learning about my upcoming workshops, classes or working with me one-on-one.  I am also available for corporate workshops and retreats.

The Music Producer 2.1 is a music production software application enabling anyone with a PC to make music. Technology uses digital music samples that you can literally drag & drop, mix, match and customize to add your own flavor. Directed acquisition of original software source code, recruited management team and headed development of a newly rebranded and enhanced product reaching across multiple music genres.
Have a Laugh and Make Your Own Music!
Have a Laugh and Make Your Own Music!

Americas Business Link is a boutique business development consulting and coaching practice designed to help entrepreneurs, start-ups and small business owners master breakthrough results. Previous clients include Subway Franchises International, White Horse Machinery, ProExport Colombia, Trade Canada, Opera Solutions, Billboard Live International, USA Broadband, Far West Rodeo, Montana World Trade Center and Junior Achievement International.
Taught Entrepreneurship & Small Business Management courses.
Institute for the Integration of Latin America & the Caribbean/Inter-American Development Bank (IDB)

Provided research, business development, event planning and logisitics. Conducted specialized research on the history of multinational economic integration and the US's position on free trade. Initiated outreach program for Washington-based institutes, NGO's and think tanks related to Latin America. Assisted coordination of 14 international policy forums.
US Foreign Commercial Service of the US Embassy in Argentina

As a Foreign Commercial Service Contractor, conducted market research, planning and the execution of specific US Export Asssitance Programs for private sector companies. Organized and managed government and private sector trade missions and business matchmakers. Responsible for logistics, customer satisfaction, quality control and overall mission results. Contracted to find distributors and representatives for US companies entering into or expanding in the Argentine market.

Generated sales leads, consulted and sold telecommunications solutions to clients. Trained on high tech platforms, computer telephony integration and commercial telecom systems. Served as a Product Manager for Intel's PC-to-PC videoconferencing solution called ProShare.

Launched the foreign correspondence department of the White House. Responsible for screening all mail written to the President and suggesting the appropriate responses. Organized and managed a team of Veteran volunteers for a special project regarding international mail.
Society of Professional Journalist, Tri-Delta, Panhellenic Representative, Fundraiser for AIDS/IU Dance Marathan, Fundraiser for National Cancer Foundation, Model UN
Society of Professional Journalist, Tri-Delta, Panhellenic Representative, Fundraiser for AIDS/IU Dance Marathan, Fundraiser for National Cancer Foundation, Model UN

Whitney is a born leader with a huge commitment to make a positive impact in the world. Through her facilitation of the Creative Insight Journey (CIJ) she teaches powerful and practical tools that will inspire and reignite your creativity and passion in your life. After I completed the CIJ Workshop with Whitney I was inspired to create my own creativity workshop and got clear about the next steps I wanted to take in my personal and professional life. I also started to collaborate with another CIJ participant in my class and fulfilled one of my dreams to record music at The Hit Factory in Miami which is one of, if not the most prestigious music studios in South Florida. This would not have been possible without me being in the CIJ class. Whitney is the real deal. She is 100% dedicated to her students success and she is an absolute gem to work with. She walks the walks and leads by example. Thank you Whitney for the lasting difference your course continues to make in my life!
Dana DellaCamera, MSMHR

Whitney has a gift for teaching by example. Her creative approach to presenting the course - through technology, art, peer relationships, traditional study and more - assures that powerful concepts reach each student in profound ways. Her enthusiasm and optimism are contagious. Her methods are practical and effective. The course itself was a buffet of solution-finding techniques that are useful to everyone, but pivotal to those determined to play a proactive role in a major transition (professional, health, family, financial, etc.). Recommended.

Whitney is a talented, trustworthy and win- win entrepreneur and businesswoman whom I have known since 2002 and I would recommend highly to anyone as a friend, client, vendor or business partner.  She also has a heart of gold, and has put aside her own business interests to take care of friends and family.  I never know if she is going through flush times or challenges in her business at any given moment, because she maintains her poise and nerve no matter the situation.  Whitney is an asset to any venture in which she gets involved.  If this recommendation seems effusive, it is sincerely expressed based on 9 years of experience with her.

November 29, 2011, Whitney managed Dana directly

Dana is a real gem and absolute pleasure to work with! She is extremely resourceful and seems to know or be able to find the right person for even some of the most obscure projects and tasks. She is a walking encyclopedia in many ways! In a variety of capacities, she proved to have a true talent as business and human resources matchmaker. As a start-up company with limited resources, finding the right people for the right budget has been critical and our abiliy to source such talent would not have been as successful without  Dana's time, talent, attention and utter persistence. Dana happens to be a very talented songwriter and singer and her interest and experience in the music and entertainment community is just another unique asset Dana brings to the table. Dana is committed to excellence in everyway. She is trustworthy, reliable and operates with the highest levels of integrity. She has been an incredible asset to our team and I wish she could have remained with us full-time. Dana has been known to go completely out of her way to get the job done and make things happen no matter what it takes. It is sometimes difficult to find people with this same kind of winning passion and spirit. I recommend Dana DellaCamera without reservation.
Dana DellaCamera, MSMHR

October 18, 2011, Whitney was a client of Steven’s

Steve is never ceases to amaze me. He is extremely focused and has been very successful in generating very unique accounts over some of the largest agencies in the industry. This is a testament to Steve's credibility ability to quickly nagivate and help his clients' see through the maze of options in the world of advertising. Most importantly, he is able to execute exceptional  high quality design and campaign strategies. He is a rare breed of no non-sense business, creativity, vision,and an overall super guy. Steve is a class-act and true asset to have at the table.  He knows the secret sauce to build a global brand and I am forever grateful for the time, energy and commitment he has put in with me and The Music Producer. We have been fortunate to have Steve and Redroute on our team!
